sourcing.instructions: - Cobalt: Obtain from chemical supply stores or online chemical distributors.
steps: - Cobalt: Obtain from chemical supply stores or online chemical distributors.
1. In a well-ventilated area, wear appropriate PPE (gloves, goggles, mask).
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a well-ventilated area, wear appropriate PPE (gloves, goggles, mask).

steps: 1. Transfer the mixture into a suitable mold (3"x2"x7").
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixture into a suitable mold (3"x2"x7").

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool gradually to room temperature (approx. 1-2 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool gradually to room temperature (approx. 1-2 hours).

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the mold.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the mold.
